name: Rafael Frank
description: 8+ years of developing world class enterprise software. Extraordinary performer recognized by management and peers for skillset, leadership, positivity and getting the job done.

experiences.description: Lightweight and flexible project management tool with simple process modelling and execution features.

activities.description: Designed, coordinated and led the implementation of several cross squad features
Led a major refactoring of the squad services, substantially improving the development experience and time to market, as well as reducing the amount of weekly support requests by half
Started an initiative to rework a long overdue piece of technical debt that has the potential of increasing the company revenue by ~5 million EUR YoY
Became the mentor of the squad and successfully improved the team's quality standards by introducing design patterns, SOLID and clean architecture principles
Improved the observability of the squad services, allowing for better data driven decisions and faster incident detection
Reworked the notifications framework of the core service of the squad, reducing the error rate and data loss from 4% to 0.03%
Supported on the resolution of many production incidents, either by bringing the relevant colleagues together, or by actively helping with troubleshooting and mitigation
Produced a variety of runbooks to help on-call engineers to recover their system to a healthy state. These helped in a faster mitigation and resolution of at least two major incidents

Produced and presented organization-wide a variety of design documents (RFC), which included a design for a Transactional Outbox to prevent loss of notifications, an Idempotent SQS Consumer framework and a solution for handling distributed transactions, based on the SAGA pattern

experiences.description: Lightweight and flexible project management tool with simple process modelling and execution features.

activities.description: Architected, designed (UX) and led the development team to build a supply chain analytics platform which leverages existing supply chain optimization applications and adds on top collaboration and automation features
Implemented several processes such as product roadmap planning, SCRUM, code reviews, pull requests, greatly increasing team efficiency and deliverables quality
Dockerized and moved ~80% of the infrastructure out of bare metal servers to azure kubernetes, allowing the implementation of automated continuous releases
Introduced automated testing culture, which allowed us to integrate these tests in the deployment pipeline, thus greatly reducing the occurrence of regressions

experiences.description: Lightweight and flexible project management tool with simple process modelling and execution features.

activities.description: Architected and developed many fullstack features, flexibly contributing to the areas most in need to guarantee stable and steady feature releases
Architected and implemented an end-to-end annotation-based OData API framework in NodeJS that drastically reduced the time needed to release new public APIs
Optimized Postgres SQL queries greatly increasing overall application and public API performance
Architected and developed the webhooks system (Fullstack) allowing developers to configure, maintain and troubleshoot integrations conveniently

experiences.description: Custom development team focused building new cloud applications and extending SAP cloud solutions.

activities.description: Developed frontend components for a high profile project for the performance brand of a major car manufacturer which allowed them to visually plan and track their production line.
Designed and developed frontend components and real time charts for a strategic IoT and predictive maintenance project for a major air compressor provider.
Designed, developed and led teams to deliver 30+ custom extensions on a variety of SAP Cloud ERP modules.
Worked closely with 20+ customers and product teams to design cloud solutions and estimate project costs.
Outstanding performance evaluation given for 5 years in a row.

experiences.description: Online vectorial editor, focused on creating, maintaining and sharing marketing content on online social networks.

activities.description: Assembled and mobilized the initial team of co-founders to further develop the idea, roadmap and kick start the development of our startup.
Defined and implemented commercial model to cover our operational expenses.
Designed and developed the backend stack focusing on security, performance and scalability using NodeJS and Postgres.
Integrated the application with major social networks, allowing paying users to post content seamlessly.

awards.title: 14 Awards for Professionalism and Teamwork
awards.description: Awarded multiple times by peers for my performance in delivering value to our customers.

awards.title: First Place at UFRGS Entrepreneurship Marathon (Flimbo)
awards.description: Flimbo won as the most innovative and overall most mature startup on the event.

awards.title: Products and Innovation Talent Award
awards.description: Nominated one of the talents of the year among the worldwide organization.

education.title: Software Analysis and Development
education.institution: Universidade do Vale do Rio dos Sinos (Unisinos)

activities.description: Thesis focused on clean architecture and dependency injection
